instruction: Explain the cultural significance of the given expression.
output: The expression "April showers bring May flowers" is a proverb that suggests that preparation in the short term can have positive results in the long term, as the rain of April encourages the blooming of flowers in May. It is also a reminder to be optimistic and patient as all of our hard work in April can help us reap the rewards of our labor during the better weather of May.
